title: Fabrication and characterization of TPGS-modified chlorogenic acid liposomes and its bioavailability in rats
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,25289-25300
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA04116J, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Jian-jun Zhang, Qiu-shui Luo, Qing-qing Li, Qian Xu, Xiang Geng, Jian-hua Xiong
CGA-TPGS-LP, a TPGS-modified liposome loaded with CGA. The entrapment efficiency and storage stability was improved. CGA-TPGS-LP showed good sustained-release ability. The oral bioavailability of CGA was improved by 1.52 times.
